name: Showtime Rhonda 2: The Guns of the Strippers
name_original: Showtime Rhonda 2: The Guns of the Strippers
description:
Help Rhonda rid the Briar Patch lounge of scoundrels in this run and gun action game! Grab your guns and rocket launcher and paint the whole place with gore!
This game is for adults only!
It is highly suggested that you play this game with a gamepad with rumble support for some sexy, bloody, rumbletastic action!
Blood, sex and strippers is how this game rolls! Check it out now!
If you like what you see here please help the development of this game!
ULTIMATE ROR PATREON
CRACKLEVANIA MAILING LIST
of visit
TOON PIMP'S PALACE
for more fun!
